name: canshare-prognostic-scoring-system
title: NZ cancer prognostic scoring system
description: Systems that may be used to score the prognostic factors of a cancer diagnosis or an "other value".

filter.value: ^ 253321000210101 |New Zealand cancer prognostic scoring system reference set| OR 74964007 |Other (qualifier value)|

Central nervous system status
Dynamic international prognostic scoring system plus for primary myelofibrosis
European LeukemiaNet standardised reporting system for genetic alterations in acute myeloid leukaemia
European treatment and outcome study prognostic score for chronic myeloid leukaemia
Extranodal marginal zone lymphoma of mucosa associated lymphoid tissue International Prognostic Index
FIGO-modified WHO 2002 prognostic scoring system
FLIPI - Follicular Lymphoma International Prognostic Index
Hodgkin lymphoma International Prognostic Score
International extranodal lymphoma study group score
International prognostic score for thrombosis in essential thrombocythemia
International prognostic scoring system for Waldenstrom macroglobulinemia
IPI- International Prognostic Index
MIPI - Mantle Cell Lymphoma International Prognostic Index
Molecular International Prognostic Scoring System for myelodysplastic syndrome
Mutation-Enhanced International Prognostic Score System age seventy for myelofibrosis
Mutation-Enhanced International Prognostic Score System age seventy plus version two for myelofibrosis
Other
Prognostic Index for T-cell lymphoma
Prognostic index of natural killer lymphoma with Epstein Barr virus
